headline: Record Volumes, New Credit Line and Dividend Move Might Change The Case For Investing In MarketAxess Holdings (MKTX)
summary: In early February 2026, MarketAxess Holdings reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results showing higher quarterly revenue and earnings alongside record trading volumes, while also extending a US$750.0 million credit facility and declaring a regular US$0.78 per-share dividend payable in March 2026. The company paired these financial updates with guidance for mid-single-digit services revenue growth in 2025 and board appointments bringing deep electronic trading, financial technology...
